snippet: The government has been cracking down on companies that treat workers as contractors for wage, tax and benefit purposes, but as employees when it comes to their work duties.
abstract: Federal government is cracking down on companies that treat workers as contractors for wage, tax and benefit purposes, but as employees when it comes to their work duties; tips are offered on hiring contractors.
lead_paragraph: The government has been cracking down on companies that treat workers as contractors for wage, tax and benefit purposes, but as employees when it comes to their work duties.

headline.main: Hiring Contractors Without Getting Into Trouble
